segments.text: The woman continues her dish drying, completely absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's utterly unaware of the clandestine operation behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those children are clearly sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a common childhood transgression, yet so boldly executed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's reach, the girl's eager anticipationâ€”it's well-coordinated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a little annoyed at their sneakiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They know exactly what they're doing is against the rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman's obliviousness is almost frustrating to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This hidden mischief feels like a little rebellion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are exploiting her distraction to their advantage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bold move, climbing on that unstable stool for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The quiet defiance in their actions is quite striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often when her back is turned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It really shows the cunning and determination of children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This little act of rebellion is a classic scene, really.
segments.speaker: PAR
